dataList.desc: ได้รับตัวตน
dataList.dlg: Your problems… will be dealt with posthaste.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเช้า
dataList.dlg: Faust doesn’t particularly enjoy locomotive travel. On a trip, it doesn’t always have to be the body that moves from one place to another.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามลางวัน
dataList.dlg: It’s important to see through to the essence of things. For instance, your clock isn’t really a clock, and WARP trains don’t exactly warp.

dataList.desc: ทักทายยามเย็น
dataList.dlg: Don’t let rumors slip under your notice, Dante. Every canard starts from a crumb of truth.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #1
dataList.dlg: To tell you the truth, Faust did not enjoy cleaning. It was the opposite, rather.

dataList.desc: สนทนา #2
dataList.dlg: Do the ends really justify the means? Is the excruciating pain you bear really worth bringing them back?

dataList.desc: สนทนา #3
dataList.dlg: You don’t seem to be as inquisitive of your situation as I am. Rather, have you decided to accept it, perhaps?

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 1
dataList.dlg: One day, I plan to collect every secret of the City and paint them all on a canvas. It’ll be something to appreciate.

dataList.desc: สนทนาหลังการผูกมัด 2
dataList.dlg: Faust likes to travel from place to place. There is no better occupation than this in that regard.

dataList.desc: Idle
dataList.dlg: …They apparently disappear without notice on occasion. End of log.

dataList.desc: ผูกมัด
dataList.dlg: I’m starting to get a good grasp of this place.

dataList.desc: เลือกเข้าทีม
dataList.dlg: Got it, let’s move.

dataList.desc: เข้าด่าน
dataList.dlg: Faust, commencing battle.

dataList.desc: ตรวบสอบตัวละครระหว่างการต่อสู้
dataList.dlg: Things are rather busying at the moment.

dataList.desc: สั่งจู่โจม
dataList.dlg: It will be quick work.

dataList.desc: ศัตรูติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Weakness noted.

dataList.desc: ติดชะงัก
dataList.dlg: Tch!

dataList.desc: สังหารศัตรู
dataList.dlg: The job is done.

dataList.desc: Ally Death
dataList.dlg: This is why I dislike trains.

dataList.desc: เช็คผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Faust, mission accomplished.

dataList.desc: เช็คล้มเหลว
dataList.dlg: Perhaps we were too hasty?

dataList.desc: ชัยชนะ
dataList.dlg: Let’s try and make it quicker next time.

dataList.desc: เงื่อนไข EX ผ่าน
dataList.dlg: Faust, reporting in with another flawless success.

dataList.desc: พ่ายแพ้
dataList.dlg: Some personnel made rather unnecessary movements.
